price: 78. « Nous vous avions apporté la vérité, mais la plupart d’entre vous avaient la vérité en horreur. »
arabic: لَقَدۡ جِئۡنَٰكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَكُمۡ لِلۡحَقِّ كَٰرِهُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: laqad ji'nākum bil-ḥaqi walākinna aktharakum lil'ḥaqqi kārihūna
